Aspear Berry.Effect: Cures freeze. Activated when a Pokémon is frozen

Babiri Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a steel-type attack. Activates when hit by steel-type move.

Black Belt.Effect: Fighting type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

BlackGlasses.Effect: Dark type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Charcoal.Effect: Fire type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Charti Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a rock-type attack. Activates when hit by rock-type move.

Cheri Berry.Effect: Cures paralysis. Activated when a Pokémon becomes paralyzed

Chesto Berry.Effect: Wakes from sleep. Activated when a Pokémon falls asleep

Chilin Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a normal-type attack. Activates when hit by normal-type move.

Chople Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a fighting-type attack. Activates when hit by fighting-type move.

Coba Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a flying-type attack. Activates when hit by flying-type move.

Colbur Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a dark-type attack. Activates when hit by dark-type move.

Deep Sea Scale.Effect: While a Clamperl holds this, their AC increases by 1.

Deep Sea Tooth.Effect: While a Clamperl holds this, their STAB increases by 1.

Dragon Fang.Effect: Dragon type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

EXP Share.Effect: While held by a carried Pokemon, up to half of XP gained from battling can be distributed to this Pokemon, even if it did not fight.

Focus Band.Effect: Roll a d20 when suffering from the flinched status. On a 10 or higher, you do not flinch.

Grepa Berry.Effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon WIS score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Haban Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a dragon-type attack. Activates when hit by dragon-type move.

Hard Stone.Effect: Rock type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Hondew Berry.Effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon DEX score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Kasib Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a ghost-type attack. Activates when hit by ghost-type move.

Kebia Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a poison-type attack. Activates when hit by poison-type move.

Kelpsy Berry.Effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon STR score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

King's Rock.Effect: On natural attack rolls of 19 or 20, the target flinches.

Leftovers.Effect: Restores 1d4 HP after each turn of the holder

Leppa Berry.Effect: Restores 10 PP to a move. Activated when Pokémon runs out of PP for a move.

Light Ball.Effect: Raises Pikachu's MOVE power modifier by +1

Lucky Egg.Effect: XP from battle for this Pokémon is increased by 20%

Lucky Punch.Effect: When held by Chansey, critical hits occur on rolls of 19 and 20.

Lum Berry.Effect: Cures any negative status effect. Activated when Pokémon is affected with status.

Magnet.Effect: Electric type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Metal Coat.Effect: Steel type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Metal Powder.Effect: When held by Ditto, its CON score increases by +3

Miracle Seed.Effect: Grass type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Mystic Water.Effect: Water type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

NeverMeltIce.Effect: Ice type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Occa Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a fire-type attack. Activates when hit by fire-type move.

Oran Berry.Effect: Restores 2d4+2 HP. Activated when Pokémon drops below 50% HP.

Papaya Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a psychic-type attack. Activates when hit by psychic-type move.

Passho Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a water-type attack. Activates when hit by water-type move.

Pecha Berry.Effect: Cures poison. Activated when a Pokémon becomes poisoned

Persim Berry.Effect: Cures confusion. Activated when Pokémon becomes confused.

Pink Bow.Effect: Normal type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Poison Barb.Effect: Poison type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Polkadot Bow.Effect: Normal type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Pomeg Berry.Effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon CON score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Qualot Berry.Effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon AC by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Quick Claw.Effect: Increase initiative roll by +3 while this Pokémon is active.

Rawst Berry.Effect: Cures burn. Activated when a Pokémon is burned

Rindo Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a grass-type attack. Activates when hit by grass-type move.

Roseli Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a fairy-type attack. Activates when hit by fairy-type move.

Scope Lens.Effect: Increase critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.)

Sharp Beak.Effect: Flying type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Shuca Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a ground-type attack. Activates when hit by ground-type move.

SilverPowder.Effect: Bug type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Sitris Berry.Effect: Restores 30 HP. Activated when Pokémon drops below 50% HP.

Spell Tag.Effect: Ghost type moves do an additional 1d4 damage of that type.

Tanga Berry.Effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a bug-type attack. Activates when hit by bug-type move.

Tomato Berry.Effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon speed by 10, but raises Loyalty by 1.
